entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ArgumentNullException does not report parameter name in message #81004
  • Leverage common container code for NativeAOT EventPipe #81002
    8.0.0
  • Fix NativeAOT EventPipe tests for non-windows platforms #80999
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT to interpreter transitions don't work for certain generic methods #80994
    8.0.0
  • Replace HillClimbing with more direct feedback-based mechanism. #80988

Closed

  • RunContinueWithStressTestsNoState timing out in CI #2271
    Future
  • NullReferenceException in LoggerFactory #80902
    Future
  • Native AOT - unable to generate MAP files #80992
  • in async static method is formatting by using $"{DateTime.Now}" is throwing Null exception in System.Buffer.Memmove #80995
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhiteSpace(string) #80986

PullRequests

Created

  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #81006
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Optimize "new DateTime(<const args>)" via improvements in JIT VN #81005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono][aot] Disable dedup for wrapper with a return type which has a … #81003
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Eliminate `ToArray` bounds checks #81001
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • JIT: build pred lists before inlining #81000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Uncover IlcGenerateMstatFile #80998
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixed CA1854 occurrences #80996
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix for issue #80350 tracking runtime deficiencies in the presence of static virtual method reabstraction #80987
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Don't look at custom attributes for field constants #80991
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change how a task stress test is disabled #80981
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Update StaticFilterOptionsMonitor.cs #80959
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: reset max bbnum after failed inline attempt #80958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix shared lib linking with lld-15 #80993
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fold `static readonly VectorX` to GT_CNS_VEC #80670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Set `TrimMode=full` for tests #80944
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono

Updated

  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure only one empty string exists in the UserString heap. #80273
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Draft] Test merging IL_Conformance #80597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Skip codegen of non-generic methods in dedup-include mode. #80903
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • WASM Toolchain Support for ARM64 #80955
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-22

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Integrate the JS implementation for `dotnet_browser_entropy` #2179

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Debug info refactoring #2178

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DOTNET_WATCH_SUPPRESS_EMOJIS=True does not suppress all emoji #30070

PullRequests

Updated

  • Do a two-phase publish to mimic VS behavior #29817
    Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inaccurate diagnostic mentioning a method isn't declared abstract but it is #66518
  • Possible to detect "external" global using aliases in analyzer? #66517
  • "abstract void Main()" compiles successfully #66516
  • Nullable enums in parameter value shown as numbers in SymbolDisplay #66514
  • Intellisense not working in Blazor razor files #66513

Closed

  • The SDK 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk' specified could not be found. #58286
    17.6 P2

PullRequests

Created

  • Add net6.0 MS.CA and MS.CA.C# build and annotate for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed CA1854 occurrences #66515
    Area-IDE, Community

Updated

  • Fix handling of Regex classification when splitting to multiple lines #66508
    Area-IDE
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • CreateCompilation default option to detect 'unsafe' keyword #66509
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Importing Framer website to Blazor is not successfull #46211
  • Blazor WASM PWA -> offline mode is not loading any resources #46210
  • Add color definitions to VS for route syntax highlighting #46207
  • Links in yml file to https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/vsts/pipelines/yaml-schema lead to a 404 error #46205
  • AmazonDynamoDBClient fails in Blazor Webassembly #46204

Closed

  • Polly: consider WebException transient #46209
  • WebSocket .NET 7 receiving empty message #46200
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix route syntax highlighting parameter color #46208
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Changed docs.microsoft.com links to learn.microsoft.com Issue: #44175 #46206
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Infinite recursion during resource lookup within System.Private.CoreLib #12826
  • Flyout background doesn't change when it's locked #12825
  • Exception when mapping nested collection with Mapster #12824

Closed

  • [iOS] App deploys fine, but doesn't get launched on simulator / phone #12827
  • InvalidateMeasure() not work at windows #10565
    Backlog
  • TabbedPage Content can't InvalidateMeasure on the Android #12205
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • "Rename" Windows' Graphics APIs to match with the rest of the platforms #12818
    t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    community ✨
  • Internalize MessagingCenter #12582
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [X] Pass the parent scopes to DataContext #8345
    area/Xaml </>
  • Add `UserAgent` property to `WebView` control. #10413
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-webview
  • Moves Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #9522
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, .NET 7 Planning

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IndexOutOfRangeException in CreateNavigationExpansionExpression(Expression sourceExpression, IEntityType entityType) / get_Chars(Int32 index) when EF class named "<>f__AnonymousType01Child" in 7.0.2 version #30115
  • Provide a simpler mechanism for requesting alternative DbContext configurations when using DI #30114
  • `GroupBy` over complex key generates redundant subquery #30113
  • Enable execution strategy to control buffering independently of retries #30112
  • SQL Server: review our unchecked casting of int to byte for Precision/Scale #30111
  • SQL Server: Precision isn't respected when sending DateTime parameters #30110

Closed

  • Any and AnyAsync methods not working. the methods returns false even if the expression should return true #30104

PullRequests

Updated

  • Translate DateTimeOffset.ToUnixTime[Seconds|Milliseconds] #28978
  • Support for DateOnly/TimeOnly for SQL Server #30109
